titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 387) to promote equitable pay practices and to eliminate discrimination within the Federal civil service.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-926.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 297 - 101 (Record Vote No: 354).

bill.summary: 9/15/1988--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 387 (Federal employee pay).
